longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for a minimum of 3 months beyond the period of
  intended stay.
 - Nationals of Germany are allowed to enter with expired
   (max. 1 year) passports, national ID cards and Child's
   travel document in lieu of passport (Kinderausweis). 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to:
 - nationals of Germany; 
- Holders of a Child's travel document in lieu of passport
  (Kinderausweis).
- Holders of a German Travel Permit Issued in Lieu of Passport
  (Reiseausweis als Passersatz), accompanied by an expired
  German passport or expired German National ID card or valid
  identification document (eg., driving license). 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Germany will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Germany are expected to hold
  their own travel document
